name: Ajuca
description:
I'm just starting to develop this, And I would love some feedback.

Updates are coming soon.

All feedback is welcome, Thank you.

You can craft, brake and then harvest resources, heal yourself by consuming red fruit. the first map has connections in all 4 cardinal points.

For anyone who wants to try the beta. if you had a char before you need to 
go to settings and hit the remove chars button, and recreate a new one, I will improve this in the future.

In character creation screen you need to select race first, then class, then modify stats and you are ready to go.

left mouse is to use, right mouse is to move.
1, 2, 3, 4 in the keyboard is for the hot-bar, you can drag and drop item from your stash (ESC) to the hotbar. you can drag and drop items from the stash to other stashes too (like the smelter stash)

there is a solid 20-30 minutes playtime 
the initial room has 4 connections in all cardinal points, only the dungeon in the main room is fully complete.

everything is connected, the room are connected via the way you traveled to.
the dungeons have a connection south to go back.

you can destroy the first resources, then harvest them once you have the required tools.

there are 3 buttons on the top right, first from right to left is game menu/char info, second is craft third is stash.

you need 3 stone to craft a stone hammer, that allows you to farm stone faster...
but you need wood for a wood workbench, in the wood workbench you can craft more things.

you can craft metal stuff in the smelter.

all tools have a efficiency modifier... not shown anywhere, but stone<wood<metal pretty much...

you can consume red fruit to heal back, there is no player dead yet in the game, so you will go negative.

There is no item/char info window yet...

there is a bug when sometimes the player does not reach the full destination of the click... i got a clear idea of what the issue is, there is another issue where you cant move just one space, you have to go for two.

there is no loading screen, so it will look a bit weird.
